title: cmd/gc: invalid line numbers when using fieldtrack
body:
Build go with:

hg clone -u release http://go.googlecode.com/hg/ go
cd go/src
env GOEXPERIMENT=fieldtrack ./make.bash

Then with the attached repository:

export GOPATH=$(pwd)
$GOROOT/bin/go run src/lineno.go 
panic: runtime error: index out of range

goroutine 1 [running]:
lineno_m.funcÂ·001()
	/tmp/junk/src/lineno_m/lineno_m.go:-53 +0x4a
lineno_m.T()
	/tmp/junk/src/lineno_m/lineno_m.go:11 +0x60
main.main()
	/tmp/junk/src/lineno.go:8 +0x18

goroutine 2 [runnable]:
exit status 2

Tested on linux/amd64 and darwin.
Attachments: 1. lineno_bug.tgz (712 bytes)
